title: Helter Skelter
description: Set against a backdrop of 90s British subculture this fast paced helter skelter ride of passion and adventure will have you gripped from cover to cover.Escaping the effects of a hangover; comic shop owner and serial chain smoker Jaz takes a different direction through town and encounters a young woman. Together they share a life changing ride fuelled by coffee, cigarettes, drugs and fun, but at what cost?Exciting, funny, yet moving, you will be unable to put Jo R Brownâ€™s brilliant debut novel down until you finish it. Enjoy!
author: Jo R. Brown
